title: AnnexRepo.add_url_to_file(batch=True) does not stage file

labels.name: adjusted-branches
labels.description: Issues caused by or affected adjusted branch operation

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

body:
Here is the expected behavior that can be seen with `batch=False`

```
(Pdb) print(ar.add_url_to_file(testfile, testurl, batch=False))
{'command': 'addurl', 'note': 'to about.txt', 'success': True, 'key': 'SHA256E-s14--198775960d0d9827f134da4e219e5793949d24b62bfcb92aa9e2dc16d411b776.txt', 'error-messages': [], 'file': 'about.txt'}

# result
(base) C:\Users\mih\AppData\Local\Temp\datalad_temp_1gz6on8v>git status
On branch adjusted/master(unlocked)
Changes to be committed:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
        new file:   about.txt
```

Batch mode should not give a different result, but does:
```
(Pdb)  print(ar.add_url_to_file(testfile, testurl, batch=True))
{'command': 'addurl', 'note': 'to about.txt', 'success': True, 'key': 'SHA256E-s14--198775960d0d9827f134da4e219e5793949d24b62bfcb92aa9e2dc16d411b776.txt', 'error-messages': [], 'file': 'about.txt'}

# result
(base) C:\Users\mih\AppData\Local\Temp\datalad_temp_1gz6on8v>git status
On branch adjusted/master(unlocked)
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
        about.txt

nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
```

This is one of the failures that plague the windows tests, and can be replicated on a real win10 box.
